description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ifq","text":"These samples are part of the JAX-Sen project in the SENNET Consortium. We aim to study and characterize senescence in the C57Bl/6 mouse kidney. We compare young (6 months old) and old (24 months old) mouse kidneys using scRNAsequencing. This protocol describes the single-cell dissociation of the kidneys before library preparation and sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: National Institute on Aging (NIA) JAX-Sen Senescence Tissue Mapping Center

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4qg7f","text":"5 ml Protein lobind tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mpsn","text":"1.5 or 2 ml Protein lobind tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq3sb","text":"Micro scissors/ scalpel","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d5f5","text":"Ice-cold PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rrqg","text":"Wide-bore pipette tips","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7n1dv","text":"GentleMACS dissociator","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcb36","text":"GentleMACS C tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fe8j8","text":"DMEM + 10% FBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epggl","text":"ACK lysis buffer – 2 ml/sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a12b7","text":"SS_buffer– 5 ml/sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71g8s","text":"40um cell strainer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9d2r2","text":"70uM strainer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ubhb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cudmf","text":"SS_Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7a371","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"804eg","text":" {"blocks":[{"key":"cueii","text":"Fill up ice buckets and prep them with reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2p27","text":"Bucket 1(small): Enzyme mix, PBS, SS_buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pvo","text":"Bucket 2 (large): For mincing tissues and sample tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2kf7","text":"Confirm if the sample is cold. Take pictures. Transfer sample to 5 ml tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3jgmt","text":"Prepare enzyme mix by adding 2.35 mL of serum-free RPMI 1640 or DMEM, 100 µL of Enzyme D, 50 µL of Enzyme R, and 12.5 µL of Enzyme A of the Multi Tissue Dissociation Kit 1 into a gentleMACS C Tube for up to 0.5 g of tissue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dkujh","text":"Mince mouse kidneys (2-4 mm3) with sterile micro scissors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"sup","offset":27,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"abdrf","text":"After cutting, transfer the sample into labeled 5 ml tubes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6t300","text":"Tightly close C Tube and attach it upside down onto the sleeve of the gentleMACS Dissociator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4akrm","text":"Run the gentleMACS Program Multi_B. If using the heating function of the gentleMACS Octo Dissociator with Heaters run program 37C_Multi_E. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekphb","text":"After termination of the program, detach C Tube from the gentleMACS Dissociator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5m3","text":"Resuspend sample and apply the cell suspension to a MACS‱ SmartStrainer (70 µm) placed on a 5 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D3F4C2AE38C511EF85BD0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3t7mr","text":"Wash MACS SmartStrainer (70 µm) with 4 mL of ice-cold PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":37,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"22a0a","text":"Centrifuge at 300 x g, 4°C, 7 min to get rid of the supernatant. Aspirate supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2a71","text":"Resuspend the cell pellet in 2 mL  ACK Lysing buffer, and incubate on ice for 3 min to exclude RBCs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":35,"length":17},{"style":"bold","offset":70,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6k0ua","text":"Add 5 mL SS_buffer  to stop  ACK Lysing buffer reaction, then collect cells by centrifugation 500 x g, 4°C, 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":94,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2m48e","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 1ml of ice cold PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8f90","text":"Filter the cell suspension through  Flowmi 40um cell strainers tube to remove debris and non-dissociated tissue fragments. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":36,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dp5b4","text":"Collect cells by centrifugation 500 x g, 4°C, 5 min and proceed to Flex protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: JAX-Sen: Mouse kidney dissociation for single-cell RNA sequencing
title_html: JAX-Sen: Mouse kidney dissociation for single-cell RNA sequencing
